response.overview: Buddy’s off on his most far-flung adventure yet! From his log cabin in rural Ohio, to the vast savannas of South Africa in search of some of the most amazing creatures God has made. Walk with lions (if you dare!), ride an elephant, and search for other exciting wildlife alongside your favorite adventurer. As you explore the wonders God has made, you’ll enjoy original songs from Buddy, biblical worldview teaching, and Scripture tie-ins.  So fire up the all-terrain vehicle (you’ll need it!), grab your camera, and prepare for another amazing adventure with Buddy Davis!
response.title: Buddy Davis' Amazing Adventures: Safari!
